医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
过去5年美国医生的职业倦怠率是多少？医生倦怠是影响美国医疗保健质量和可用性的一个主要问题。这个问题的发生率不断上升，引发了最近一项旨在查明其根源的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/What-is-the-burnout-rate-among-US-physicals-over-the-past-5-years.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/What-is-the-burnout-rate-among-US-physicals-over-the-past-5-years.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=651c4076-3f30-45b8-8472-90be968797d0 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 11:20:00 -0400 What is the burnout rate among US physicians over the past 5 years?
支持远程糖尿病自我护理的远程医疗模式研究人员开发并测试了虚拟糖尿病专科诊所 (VDiSC) 的有效性，这是一种促进远程全面糖尿病护理的虚拟模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/A-telehealth-model-to-support-remote-diabetes-self-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/A-telehealth-model-to-support-remote-diabetes-self-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=500b2672-4802-4f21-bde1-46ab9deef01b Fri, 06 Oct 2023 10:54:00 -0400 A telehealth model to support remote diabetes self-care

有色人种的母亲无法了解服务提供者是否有虐待历史。为什么不？去年，当塞拉姆·所罗门·考德威尔和她的丈夫得知她怀孕时，寻找合适的妇产科医生的风险很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Mothers-of-color-cane28099t-see-if-providers-have-a-history-of-mistreatment-Why-not.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Mothers-of-color-cane28099t-see-if-providers-have-a-history-of-mistreatment-Why-not.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb1e5de0-56fc-43f2-9380-c0f6358d997b Fri, 06 Oct 2023 10:36:10 -0400 Mothers of color can’t see if providers have a history of mistreatment. Why not?

针对阿尔茨海默病风险基因的突破性抗体疗法为有效治疗带来希望研究人员介绍并表征了一种基于单克隆抗体 (mAb) 的新型平台。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Breakthrough-antibody-therapy-targets-Alzheimers-risk-gene-offers-hope-for- effective-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Breakthrough-antibody-therapy-targets-Alzheimers-risk-gene-offers-hope-for- effective-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ced13a53-c470-4b0c-a9b9-7a7d216aedc2 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 10:06:00 -0400 Breakthrough antibody therapy targets Alzheimer's risk gene, offers hope for effective treatment
企业家亚历山德拉·诺尔 (Alexandra Knauer) 荣获柏林州功绩勋章亚历山德拉·诺尔 (Alexandra Knauer) 因其作为一位成功且对社会特别忠诚的企业家所取得的成就而受到表彰。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Entrepreneur-Alexandra-Knauer-honored-with-order-of-merit-of-the-state-of-Berlin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Entrepreneur-Alexandra-Knauer-honored-with-order-of-merit-of-the-state-of-Berlin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4f49093-7f23-4cf2-a39b-27e251981f16 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 09:40:00 -0400 Entrepreneur Alexandra Knauer honored with order of merit of the state of Berlin
BIOVECTRA 与 Acuitas Therapeutics 签署用于制造基于 mRNA 的疗法的独特脂质纳米颗粒 (LNP) 递送系统的服务协议BIOVECTRA 和 Acuitas Therapeutics, Inc. 今天宣布，他们已开始提供技术转让服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/BIOVECTRA-signs-service-agreement-with-Acuitas-Therapeutics-for-unique-lipid-nanoarticle-(LNP)-delivery-system-used-in-制造-mRNA-based-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/BIOVECTRA-signs-service-agreement-with-Acuitas-Therapeutics-for-unique-lipid-nanoarticle-(LNP)-delivery-system-used-in-制造-mRNA-based-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4a11b08-9bc5-4484-b788-d09dd40033d1 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 09:23:00 -0400 BIOVECTRA signs service agreement with Acuitas Therapeutics for unique lipid nanoparticle (LNP) delivery system used in manufacturing mRNA-based therapies
Bio-Rad 扩展了用于临床前和临床药物开发的抗独特型抗体的范围生命科学研究和临床诊断产品领域的全球领导者 Bio-Rad Laboratories 今天推出了六种针对 dupilumab (Dupixent) 的特异性抗体，并增加了新的 evolocumab (Repatha)，扩大了其重组单克隆抗独特型抗体的范围。伊匹单抗（Yervoy）和苏金单抗（Cosentyx）抗体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Bio-Rad-Extends-Range-of-Anti-Idiotypic-Antibodies-for-Use-in-Preclinical-and-Clinical-Drug-Development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231006/Bio-Rad-Extends-Range-of-Anti-Idiotypic-Antibodies-for-Use-in-Preclinical-and-Clinical-Drug-Development.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=166b847f-58d4-449d-8a4d-23f621b06cc6 Fri, 06 Oct 2023 09:06:00 -0400 Bio-Rad Extends Range of Anti-Idiotypic Antibodies for Use in Preclinical and Clinical Drug Development
研究强调老年人残疾方面的种族和民族差异大约 40% 的老年黑人患有残疾，而整体老年人中只有三分之一患有残疾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Study-highlights-racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-disability-among-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Study-highlights-racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-disability-among-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de8ab48b-abb0-4711-932b-8e03ee161b2f Thu, 05 Oct 2023 22:59:21 -0400 Study highlights racial and ethnic disparities in disability among older adults
